text: The Miss Perú 1983 pageant was held on June 3, 1983. That year, 16 candidates were competing for the national crown. The chosen winner represented Peru at the Miss Universe 1983http://www.pageantopolis.com/universe-lists-p-to-z.html and Miss World 1983. The rest of the finalists would enter in different pageants.http://www.caretas.com.pe/Main.asp?T=3082&idE;=874&idA;=45849#.VAHAs8VdXSE ==Placements== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" !width="220" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Final Results !width="300" style="background-color:#787878;color:#FFFFFF;"|Contestant |- | Miss Peru Universe 1983 | *22px Distrito Capital - Vivien Griffiths Shields |- | Miss World Peru 1983 | *22px Region Lima - Lizbet Alcázar |- | Miss Maja Peru 1983 | *22px Tumbes - Silvia Higueras |- | 1st Runner-Up | *22px Cajamarca - Carolina Anduaga |- | 2nd Runner-Up | *22px Tacna - Diana Puente |- | Top 10 | * 22px Ucayali - Jessica Roisenwit * 22px Moquegua - Verónica Rodríguez * 22px Amazonas - Viviana Alvarado * 22px Loreto - Sheyla Morey * 22px La Libertad - Monique Gabuteau |} ==Special Awards== * Best Regional Costume -
